actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the continued income tax deductibility of contributions to Individual Retirement Accounts.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives the deductibility of contributions to individual retirement accounts should be maintained for all citizens as part of any tax reform legislation.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the continued income tax deductibility of contributions to Individual Retirement Accounts.
